title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, August 5, 2020
description: The comic strip "Little Orphan Annie" on this day in 1924. Creator Harold Gray was staunchly anti-FDR, but the musical version intentionally subverted his politics.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The comic strip "Little Orphan Annie" on this day in 1924. Creator Harold Gray was staunchly anti-FDR, but the musical version intentionally subverted his politics.
